content: ***pattern includes instructions for 5 sizes from 0-3 months up to toddler **** find the adult and child-size here>>> https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/claire-bun-beanie these beanies are so stinking cute they work up super fast this style of beanie has always sold well for me online and at craft markets pattern includes a full video tutorial for each size i have also included a free pdf printable of beanie labels i created for you guys just cut them out roll your beanie wrap the label around the beanie roll and tape closed a cute piece of washi tape would be perfect i give out a free pack of handmade with love wrap labels every wednesday you can subscribe to my newsletter here >>>https //mailchi mp/acraftyconcept/unicornwraps and start receiving them in your inbox
